global.name: service
value:
tosca_definitions_version: cloudify_dsl_1_2

imports:
 - http://www.getcloudify.org/spec/cloudify/3.3.1/types.yaml
 - http://127.0.0.1/1607_prod/type_files/cdap_app.yaml

node_templates:
  SM:
    type: dcae.nodes.cdap_app
    properties:
      service_name: "cdap-string-matching"
      deployment_JSON: |-
          {
            "clusterService": {"$ref": "/services/vm-cdap-cluster-central/instances/rdm2-central"},
            "$class": "com.att.ecomp.dcae.controller.service.cdap.CdapServiceInstance",
            "namespace": "<%= dcae_target_name %>",
            "appNames": [ "SM" ],
            "flowNames": [ "SM.SimpleFlow" ],
            "apps": {
              "SM": {
                "jarFile": "/opt/app/dcae-analytics-closed-loop-tca-jars/lib/CdapClosedLoopSnmpTrapTca-0.1.jar",
                "artifactName": "CdapClosedLoopSnmpTrapTca",
                "version": "0.1"
              }
            },
          
            "configuration": {
             "$class": "com.att.ecomp.dcae.clamp.common.TcaConfiguration",
              "messageReaderConsumerID":"4699",
              "messageReaderConsumerGroup": "<%= dcae_target_name %>",
              "aaiURL": "http://REPLACE_THIS_WITH_IP_PORT_FROM_BOOTED_DOCKER/tenant/",
              "closedLoopEventClient": "configuration.dcae.microservice.Tca.xml",
              "dcae_target_name": "<%= dcae_target_name %>",
              "dcae_target_type": "VM",
          
              "serviceConfigurations": {}
            }
          }}}
